section.name: Basic Support
section.p: The basic support for DPML hosted products is through the community effort, mainly the mailing list support-dpml@lists.ibiblio.org. Questions and support requests will be handled on a best-effort basis from each member of the community willing to do so. For more information about the mailing lists, check this page.

As with all Open Source projects, you can not be guaranteed any help from the core developers, and other users may not be able to help you out. The core developers take pride in trying to help out as much as possible and answer questions that may arise, but they also need to further this project as well as put food on the table, so your question may take a day or two before being attended to.
